QuestData.Title: Leathery Venom Gland
QuestData.Description:
<You pry a leathery gland from the snapdragon corpse. Drops of venom spill from an opening on one end and sizzle as they touch the ground, leaving small holes behind.
This toxin appears to be very potent. It would be best to bring it back to Newhome.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Leathery Venom Gland to Finder Palta in Newhome in Nazjatar.
